IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_quest_item_usable_count') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_quest_item_usable_count GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_quest_item_usable_count @item_id dbo.id_t, @usable_count TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Quest_Inventories SET usable_count = @usable_count WHERE id = @item_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
